This file contains bidirectional Unicode text that may be interpreted or compiled differently than what appears below. To review, open the file in an editor that reveals hidden Unicode characters. Learn more about bidirectional Unicode characters


  


    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            | maxPartitions     | Non mandatory parameter which sets maximum partitions to use during refresh. If not set, maximum allowed amount from panelType will be used.|
          
          
            
            | maxPartitions     | Optional parameter which sets maximum partitions to use during refresh. If not set, maximum allowed amount from panelType will be used.|
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -36,6 +36,8 @@ Currently binding supports the following panels: EVO192, EVO48(not tested), EVO9
 | port              | The port used for data communication. Default value is 10000.|
 | panelType         | Not mandatory. Will be used if discovery does not identify the panel. Otherwise provide EVO48, EVO96, EVO192, etc...|
 | reconnectWaitTime | Value is in seconds. The time to wait before a reconnect occurs after socket timeout.|
+| maxPartitions     | Non mandatory parameter which sets maximum partitions to use during refresh. If not set, maximum allowed amount from panelType will be used.|

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -36,6 +36,8 @@ Currently binding supports the following panels: EVO192, EVO48(not tested), EVO9
 | port              | The port used for data communication. Default value is 10000.|
 | panelType         | Not mandatory. Will be used if discovery does not identify the panel. Otherwise provide EVO48, EVO96, EVO192, etc...|
 | reconnectWaitTime | Value is in seconds. The time to wait before a reconnect occurs after socket timeout.|
+| maxPartitions     | Non mandatory parameter which sets maximum partitions to use during refresh. If not set, maximum allowed amount from panelType will be used.|
+| maxZones          | Non mandatory parameter which sets maximum zones to use during refresh. If not set, maximum allowed amount from panelType will be used.|

nodes.bodyText:
Labels are all upper case

  
    
  
    

  
  This file contains bidirectional Unicode text that may be interpreted or compiled differently than what appears below. To review, open the file in an editor that reveals hidden Unicode characters. Learn more about bidirectional Unicode characters


  


    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            				<label>Max zones to check</label>
          
          
            
            				<label>Max Check Zones</label>
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -48,6 +48,16 @@
 				<description>The time to wait before a reconnect occurs after socket timeout. Value is in seconds</description>
 				<default>30</default>
 			</parameter>
+			<parameter name="maxZones" type="integer" required="false" unit="s">
+				<label>Max zones to check</label>

nodes.bodyText:
This file contains bidirectional Unicode text that may be interpreted or compiled differently than what appears below. To review, open the file in an editor that reveals hidden Unicode characters. Learn more about bidirectional Unicode characters


  


    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            				<label>Max partitions to check</label>
          
          
            
            				<label>Max Check Partitions</label>
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -48,6 +48,16 @@
 				<description>The time to wait before a reconnect occurs after socket timeout. Value is in seconds</description>
 				<default>30</default>
 			</parameter>
+			<parameter name="maxZones" type="integer" required="false" unit="s">
+				<label>Max zones to check</label>
+				<description>Maximum number of configured zones to check (from zone 1 to maxZones)</description>
+				<default>0</default>
+			</parameter>
+			<parameter name="maxPartitions" type="integer" required="false" unit="s">
+				<label>Max partitions to check</label>

nodes.bodyText: I would prefer to keep the old constructor pattern (with scope private)
Do you mean that in the .build() I should call the constructor with every initialization field as parameter of the constructor, taken from the builder?
Yes. But since the parameters are available in the builders, you can call without the builder-prefix
Good that you noticed it. I will remove it. Thanks !
